fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Unholy Majesty** â€” Appear before someone in your divine glory during the day. They'll know that Igu, Crystalline Seraph appeared before them, and they'll be so stunned by your beauty that they won't be able to talk for the rest of the day. The next night, you may force them to deal a Basic attack to a player of your choice as their night action.
- Shine bright like a diamond at someone each night. You'll learn their role and the roles of their closest living neighbours, but you won't know which is which.
- Dazzle brilliantly at night, roleblocking every non-Mafia player in the game. You may only dazzle brilliantly once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each time you use Unholy Majesty, you may also choose to reveal your name to your target. If you do, you will gain a use of dazzling brilliantly.
- You may not reveal your name until Day 3, because you're uncomfortable with that.
